title: How to Capture Job Notes Using Voice-to-Text
description: Document jobs hands-free using your phone's voice features. No typing required.
requirements: The built-in notes or voice memo app

steps.title: Use voice-to-text in your notes app
steps.description: The easiest way to capture notes hands-free.
substeps: Open Notes (iPhone) or Google Keep (Android)
Tap to create a new note
Tap the microphone icon on your keyboard
Speak your notes — it transcribes automatically
steps.tip: Say punctuation out loud: 'Replaced water heater PERIOD Customer happy PERIOD'

steps.title: Try voice memos for longer notes
substeps: Open Voice Memos (iPhone) or Recorder (Android)
Hit record and describe what you did
Include: What was done, any issues found, recommendations
Stop and save — transcribe later or keep the audio

steps.title: Use Siri or Google Assistant
steps.description: Create notes without even unlocking your phone.
substeps: Say: 'Hey Siri, take a note' or 'OK Google, take a note'
Dictate your job notes
The note is saved automatically
Review and organize later
steps.tip: Works great when your hands are dirty or full.

steps.title: Try Otter.ai for automatic transcription
steps.description: Free app that transcribes audio with high accuracy.
substeps: Download Otter.ai (free on iPhone/Android)
Create an account
Hit record and speak your notes
Otter transcribes automatically with timestamps
Export or copy the text to your records

steps.title: Create a job notes habit
steps.description: Make voice notes part of your job completion routine.
substeps: Before leaving each job: Take 60 seconds to record notes
Include: What you did, what you found, what you recommend
Take photos while you're talking
This creates a complete job record

successMessage: You can now document jobs hands-free! No more forgetting details or typing on a dirty phone.
proTips: Voice notes + photos = bulletproof documentation for warranty claims or disputes
Review your voice notes weekly and add important info to your CRM
Some CRM apps (Jobber, HouseCall Pro) have built-in voice note features
